sentence: Guest Op-Ed By Rep. Paul Gosar During a rare press conference appearance last week, Joe Biden came out of hiding and green-lighted a Russian invasion of Ukraine.
author: Assistant Editor
title: Paul Gosar: ‘We Have No Dog in The Ukraine Fight’ (EXCLUSIVE)

author: Mike LaChance
title: Biden Admin Reportedly Diverting U.S. Border Patrol Agents To Assist In Ukraine Conflict

sentence: The thinking behind this is that it would show Democrats that if they remove Republican representatives from their assignments for politically-motivated reasons as they did with Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) and Paul Gosar (R-AZ), then they would be given the same treatment.
author: Jeff Charles
title: Yes, We Absolutely Should Impeach President Biden
